description: This is the main entry point for a Vue.js frontend application. It imports necessary styles, creates the Vue app, applies state management with Pinia, sets up routing, and mounts the app to the DOM.

methods.name: createApp
methods.description: Creates a new Vue application instance.

methods.name: use
methods.description: Registers plugins or features with the Vue app, such as state management and routing.

methods.name: mount
methods.description: Mounts the Vue application to a DOM element specified by its selector.
